<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Boggard Swampseer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2858)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The boggard swampseer has been gifted with magic through their worship of the demon lord [Gogunta](/Deities.aspx?ID=25), and they use their power to rule a boggard village, keeping the rest of the village in line and planning raids on nearby communities.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Boggard_Swampseer.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Boggard Swampseer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2858)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=529" />
<trait label="Boggard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=743" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 45 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +11; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Boggard](/Languages.aspx?ID=27), [Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +9, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +11, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +8, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +0

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +11 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 40

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 25 feet; swamp passage

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +10 ([two-hand d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d4+6 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tongue +10 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** tongue grab

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 21, attack +11
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Caustic Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=1461), [Frostbite](/Spells.aspx?ID=1539), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Tangle Vine](/Spells.aspx?ID=1713)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Jump](/Spells.aspx?ID=167), [Runic Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=1658)
- **2nd**
[Acid Grip](/Spells.aspx?ID=1436), [Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=1606)

**Destructive Croak** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) The swampseer utters a powerful croak that deals 4d6 sonic damage to any non-boggard within a 15-foot emanation any creature with the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) condition takes additional sonic damage equal to twice the value of its frightened condition. The boggard can't use Destructive Croak again for 1d4 rounds.

**Drowning Drone** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** The boggard swampseer or one of their allies within 60 feet attempts a saving throw against an [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=541) or [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=697) effect; **Effect** The swampseer releases a croak that drowns out other sounds. They roll a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) check. They and boggard allies in the area can use the higher result between the swampseer's Performance check and their saves to resolve the effects against the auditory or sonic effect.

**Swamp Passage**   A boggard ignores [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453) caused by swamp terrain features.

**Terrifying Croak** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The boggard unleashes a terrifying croak. Any non-boggard within 30 feet becomes [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) unless they succeed at a DC 19 Will save; those who critically succeed are temporarily immune for 1 minute.

**Tongue Grab**   If the boggard hits a creature with their tongue, that creature becomes [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) by the boggard. Unlike with a normal Grab, the creature isn't [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81), but it can't move beyond the reach of the boggard's tongue. A creature can sever the tongue by hitting AC 15 and dealing at least 4 slashing damage. Though this doesn't deal any damage to the boggard, it prevents them from using their tongue Strike until they regrow their tongue, which takes a week.

</column>
